ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Overview of major film theories. Absolutely necessary for anyone considering Film Studies as their academic interest.
I would definitely recommend it to anyone interested in film theory.
I would recommend this class to anyone hoping to work in film studies. It provides a really solid theoretical foundation for future scholars and lay cinephiles.
The course is a survey of film studies and theory texts that are crucial to the field. I would certainly recommend that all film and media studies students take this course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course is required for Film and Media Studies students.
A very solid foundation to my continuing pursuit of film theory.
This course gave an excellent review of the core readings in film studies, which will be helpful regardless of my specific dissertation topic.
